title: permanently banned appeal
body:

I was a bit annoyed that we lost that game, so I was toxic at the end of the game.
I reported the feeders, after 5 min I got permanently banned, the feeders didn't get banned tho.

you can check the game[here](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1977653005/36646686?tab=overview)

draven was spam pinging everyone when they die.
fizz was doing the same thing as draven.
tristana was feeding, she only got 13 kills because of trynda.

Riot, I want my account back, please.
I invested so much on this account, it's such a shame to go all to waste.

replies.body:
Inting =/= doing poorly.

They also don't go back on permabans unless they were mistakenly given, sorry mate.

> [{quoted}](name=Sofrex,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FmOVFRsy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-05T01:49:59.466+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=Sofrex,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FmOVFRsy,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-05T02:01:43.610+0000)

> I get banned. He doesn't. why?

Because one game of that isn't enough to get banned especially when he has games of 10/2 Kayle.

The toxicity was there already when you were accusing people of being a  troll.

Then you encourage others to harm themselves, which is the nail in the coffin.

when I said "troll" I was talking about trynda actually, which he is on the enemy team!
and my teammates were chasing him in our base. 

"encourage " such a strong word. "kys" is simply a sarcastic comment to them, when they spam pinging me.
If you are going to be sarcastic about it, don't say it.

There's no way you're getting your account back. No such thing as an appeal for justified permabans.
You can make a new account though.
You dont get to appeal permbans, especially not with that sort of record.
